name: Bryan Green
text: Good food. Service was prompt. Waitress could use a little more people skills though. Not bad just awkward.

name: Patrick Toy
text: Went for the salad bar. Disappointing. Brown lettuce and almost empty ingredients. Three tables in the place. All three had someone going to the salad bar. Thought they would have made sure it looked good and had been stocked. Guess it was not a priority.

name: Stacie
text: Great Store in Hartville and in Springfield twp. Kind service. Taste Great! No issues or complaints, just compliments! Great job!

And one time a pizone I got was the best one and they haven‚Äôt been the same since. This Pizza Hut is bad but the one over at Townpark Blvd in green Ohio is way better. So if you can go there.

name: Mike Nichols
text: The Pizza Hut in Hartville is always consistent and friendly. They have a great lunch buffet through the week and salad bar in the evening. Clean restaurant with lots of local sports memorabilia. Live televisions in the front room.

Tried to call numerous times but apparently they take the phone off the hook. 1 hour and ten minutes later we had to order elsewhere..delivery guy showed up 1 hour and 20 minutes..sorry we don't want it.
